title: Lemon Curd
notes: This is the only lemon curd recipe, all others pale in comparison.
steps: In a saucepan, boil water. Place a heat-proof mixing bowl over the water, and whisk together lemon juice, zest, sugar, and eggs.
Stir in butter and cook over moderately low heat, whisking frequently, until curd is thick enough to hold marks of the whisk and bubbles appear on the surface, about 6 minutes.
Chill for at least an hour before using.
